title: Quantum Sturm-Liouville Equation, Quantum Resolvent, Quantum Integrals, and Quantum KdV : the Fast Decrease Case
abstract: We construct quantum operators solving the quantum versions of the Sturm-Liouville equation and the resolvent equation, and show the existence of conserved currents. The construction depends on the following input data: the basic quantum field $O(k)$ and the regularization .
